message_1: Consider the following sequence: 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, ... What is the next number in this sequence according to inductive logic?
message_2:
The given sequence is an arithmetic sequence with a common difference of 5. To find the next number in the sequence, we simply add the common difference to the last given number.

25 (last number) + 5 (common difference) = 30

So, the next number in the sequence is 30.
